item.title: How do i make starter invotorey appear only once? [devolution_v7]
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:267306”]use an integer and allow starter only once

public int starter = 0;

My code

if (starter == 0) { playerItems[0] = 1051; playerItemsN[0] = 1; playerItems[1] = 996; playerItemsN[1] = 20000; starter = 1; }
i want to the int starter to save, how can i make it save?

Read full topic
